customer_name: T M K Sports & Entertainment L L C
site_name: T M K SPORTS & ENTERTAINMENT L L C
narrative:
This facility was previously licensed under 16-C-0134.
This was a prelicense inspection for a Class "C" Exhibitor license. They exhibit reindeer for 5 - 6 weeks a year. 
The inspection was conducted at 48 Arch St, Greenwich, CT. 
Facility meets all standards and regulations at this time. 
The Application form, Debt Collection form, $10 processing fee check and $30 application fee check are all
attached.
